name: Scarpa T2 Eco Telemark Boots - Women's
description: Bigger, higher, stiffer. These are regarded by many as the ultimate, all around tele boots. They give you balanced climbing and descending performance. The boot frame and performance liners deliver power to drive skis through tough, chopped up conditions. But you don't have to sacrifice comfort and ability to climb when it's time to turn around, skin up and hit that glade again.Shell is made of Pebax Rnew, a plant based plastic.Intuition Performance Flex G liner blends high-density and regular Intuition foam to hit the sweet spot of comfort and performance.Booster® Active power strap improves responsiveness.Walk/ski lever, and adjustable forward lean.Easy lock micro-adjust buckles.Replaceable edge guard protects bellows and disperses forefoot buckle pressure.Soles are Vibram® Print with a telemarking interface and soft rubber heel with lugs positioned for downhill walking.
